00061 
00062 public:
00064     vtkTypeRevisionMacro(vtkPointPlotter,vtkObject);
00065

00068 
00070     const char *GetClassName() {return "vtkPointPlotter";};
00071

00074

00077

00080

00092

00095 
00097     void InsertPoint(double x, double y, double z, unsigned char r, unsigned char g, unsigned char b);
00098

00100     vtkPointPlotter();
